title: Understanding Cultural Competency
text: Cultural competency involves understanding and respecting the cultural differences and similarities within, among, and between groups. It is crucial in providing effective healthcare.

title: Key Aspects of Cultural Competency
text: Consider how cultural values, beliefs, and practices can influence healthcare decisions and outcomes.
